agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 9, 2019 PLACE: E1.014 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier HB 583 White | et al. Relating to monuments and memorials for Texas heroes and other persons and events of historical significance; creating criminal offenses. HB 3213 Collier Relating to the eligibility of certain exhibitions and festivals to receive funding through the Major Events Reimbursement Program. HB 4008 Frullo Relating to plans required to be submitted to receive funding through the Major Events Reimbursement Program. HB 4595 Guillen Relating to a study and report on the optimum water level of Falcon Lake. HCR 122 Hefner Designating Pittsburg as the official Hot Link Capital of Texas for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. HCR 131 Cyrier Designating Bastrop County as the official Film Hospitality Capital of Texas for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. *The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. Public testimony may be limited to three (3) minutes per individual.* NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
